mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEMID, LISTPRICE, UNITCOST, SUPPLIER AS supplierId, I.PRODUCTID AS "product.productId", NAME AS "product.name", DESCN AS "product.description", CATEGORY AS "product.categoryId", STATUS, ATTR1 AS attribute1, ATTR2 AS attribute2, ATTR3 AS attribute3, ATTR4 AS attribute4, ATTR5 AS attribute5, I.STOCKNUM FROM ITEM I, PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID AND I.PRODUCTID = #{value}

select I.ITEMID, LISTPRICE, UNITCOST, SUPPLIER AS supplierId, I.PRODUCTID AS "product.productId", NAME AS "product.name", DESCN AS "product.description", CATEGORY AS "product.categoryId", STATUS, ATTR1 AS attribute1, ATTR2 AS attribute2, ATTR3 AS attribute3, ATTR4 AS attribute4, ATTR5 AS attribute5, QTY AS quantity, I.STOCKNUM from ITEM I, INVENTORY V, PRODUCT P where P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID and I.ITEMID = V.ITEMID and I.ITEMID = #{value}
select I.stocknum from ITEM I, INVENTORY V, PRODUCT P where P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID and I.ITEMID = V.ITEMID and I.ITEMID = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE item set itemid=#{itemId}, productid=#{productId}, listprice=#{listPrice}, unitcost=#{unitCost}, supplier=#{supplierId}, status=#{status}, attr1=#{attribute1}, attr2=#{attribute2}, attr3=#{attribute3}, attr4=#{attribute4}, attr5=#{attribute5}, stocknum=#{stocknum} WHERE itemid=#{itemId}
